A wide variety of AIs to interact with, covering a lot of scenarios. The AI answers can be "rerolled" if they don't make sense or are not preferred, but you can also just edit the response to whatever you want/need it to say. My only gripes are that the AI answers seem rather short most of the time, and the AI will lead you to do one thing, then will say it can't do that on its next response. Very annoying to deal with.

I love how this ai responds to short messages (even though it's sometimes slow) They can create a storyline instantly, and the phrasing of each speech is very natural and strange for an ai compared to others. I'm really enjoying it so far! 5/5 stars.

The app shows a lot of potential but needs significant improvements to better serve users. While it often presents results in a user-friendly way, it tends to lean towards overly positive or favorable answers without offering complete accuracy.
